info.name: Google Services Hopefully Cleaner RTL Contents
info.description:
Google Services Hopefully Cleaner RTL Contents - by EllCiii

This userstyle: 
- Makes RTL (Right-to-Left scripts like Arabic, Hebrew and Persian) more readable on Google Services:
  Gmail, Google+, Chat, Reader, Search, Calendar, Groups, Youtube, Buzz...
- Adjust Font style, size and direction, especially usefull for users with Non RTL Browsers GUI.
- Remove adverstisements and make the content like emails in Gmail start at the right, point.
info.additionalInfo:
History
 - GSHC-RTL follows-up the great (but discontinued as of June 2010):
 - Web3beta http://userstyles.org/styles/25115/web3beta-rtl-all-service-google-tt-ff
 - Some other brilliant author's rulesets are tested, selected, edited then added to this ruleset.
 - As a rule, any selected userstyle and author is cited.
Collaboration
 - Any proposal, correction or collaboration effort to improve the script is totaly welcome.
